entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -17.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
